string-array.item:
Poor Man's Account Tracker allows you to keep track of your financial situation.

 Configure banks and accounts, then;
 • Manually enter transactions
 • Receive transaction updates via SMS from other users

Select 'Add Bank' from the options menu.

 Configure the bank details as follows;
 • Enter the bank name
 • Enter phone numbers as needed.
 	Note: Select the Contacts button to the right of the number field to enter a number from phone contacts.
 • Configure SMS templates as needed.
 	Note: A Text Banking phone number must be entered before SMS templates may be created.

Select 'Add Account' from the options menu.

 Configure the account details as follows;
 • Enter the account name
 • Enter the account nickname (as used by Text Banking)
 • Select the account type
 • Select the account currency
 • Select the bank the account is held with
 • Select the date the account was opened
 • Enter the initial balance
 • Enter the credit limit for creditcard accounts, or overdraft limit for current accounts

A transaction may be entered in a number of ways;
 • Select 'Add Transaction' from the options menu
 • Select 'Add Transaction' from the Account Snapshot screen

 Enter the transaction details as follows;
 • Enter the transaction type; Credit, Debit or Transfer
 • Enter the transaction amount
 • Select the account(s)
 • Select the payee/payer
 • Select the categories
 	Note: Categories are not applicable to Transfers.
 • Select the individual categories to enter category amount
 	Note: If the total amount entered for all categories is different to the transaction amount entered, use the Update Amount button to adjust the transaction amount.
 • Select the date and time
 • Enter an optional reference, e.g. cheque number
 • Enter an optional note

From the Account Snapshot screen, select the account to view.

 The following details will be displayed;
 • Current balance
 • Available balance, i.e balance available including any pending transactions
 • Transactions within the specified timeframe

 Once the account summary is displayed;
 • Change the transactions timeframe to view more or less transactions
 • Change the display order by selecting the sort method
 • See more transaction details by selecting the transaction summary
 • Select the transaction details to edit or delete the transaction
 • Switch to another account by selecting it from the list at the top of the screen
 • Add a transaction by selecting 'Add Account' from the options menu
 • Edit the bank by selecting 'Edit Bank' from the options menu

Select 'Add SMS Template' from the options menu.

 Configure the SMS Template as follows;
 • Enter the template name
 • Select the template type
 • Select the bank the template applies to
 • Add template fields by;
 	> Adding new field
 	> Selecting field type
 	> If a Text field, enter fixed text
 • Reorder fields by selecting up/down
 • Delete individual fields as required

Select 'Add User' from the options menu.

 Configure the user as follows;
 • Enter the user name
 • Enter the user phone number.
 	Note: Select the Contacts button to the right of the number field to enter a number from phone contacts.

 Existing users may be updated by selecting them from the current user list and updating the details before saving again.
